body:
Hi,
Selling Riskayyy & Slorta with 1 optifine cape for $15 USD 
Good rep, not banned on other servers.

edit: PayPal payment online through the friends and family option. 


Thanks.

title: Selling two accounts cheap

replies.body: Were you the one online on Slorta? And wasn't it $30.
